   .. py:attribute:: join_words
      :value: '((LEFT\\s+|RIGHT\\s+|FULL\\s+)?(INNER\\s+|OUTER\\s+|STRAIGHT\\s+)?|(CROSS\\s+|NATURAL\\s+)?)?JOIN\\b'

      :value: '(GROUP|ORDER)\\s+BY\\b'
